definition: thirty-fifth year E11 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1958 or 2018
fifth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fifth in order/letter "E" or Roman "V" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/penta
11th earthly branch: 7-9 p.m., 9th solar month (8th October-6th November), year of the Dog/ancient Chinese compass point: 300°
see 屈戌兒|屈戌儿[qu1 qu5 er5]
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty

the Six Gentlemen Martyrs of the failed reform movement of 1898, executed in its aftermath, namely: Tan Sitong 譚嗣同|谭嗣同[Tan2 Si4 tong2], Lin Xu 林旭[Lin2 Xu4], Yang Shenxiu 楊深秀|杨深秀[Yang2 Shen1 xiu4], Liu Guangdi 劉光第|刘光第[Liu2 Guang1 di4], Kang Guangren 康廣仁|康广仁[Kang1 Guang3 ren2] and Yang Rui 楊銳|杨锐[Yang2 Rui4]
coup by Dowager Empress Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4] ending the 1898 attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty

sentences.english: After the Hundred Days' Reform, great changes took place in the ideological circle.
sentences.chinese: 戊戌政變後，思想界發生急劇變化。

sentences.english: Wu-Xu thoughts of "save the nation from extinction" and "enlightenment" promoted the trend of "history revolution".
sentences.chinese: 戊戌救亡啓蒙思潮催動了“史學革命”潮流。

sentences.english: It is actually reflection of this view that she cruelly kept down the Movement of 1898.
sentences.chinese: 她殘酷地鎮壓戊戌變法運動就是這一基本思想的反映。

sentences.english: Firstly, it discusses the formation background of Civil Right Thought of Reform Clique.
sentences.chinese: 首先論述了戊戌維新民權思想形成的背景。

sentences.english: The second part analyzed the movement of anti-foot-binding launched by Wuxu Reformists from the aspects of thoughts and observations.
sentences.chinese: 從思想言論方面對戊戌維新派的不纏足進行闡述。

sentences.english: The fifth part was a basic summary to the movement of anti-foot-binding launched by Wuxu Reformists.
sentences.chinese: 對戊戌時期維新派領導的不纏足運動的一個基本評析。

sentences.english: The Reform Movement of 1898 is a revolutionary movement of bourgeois nature.
sentences.chinese: 戊戌變法是一次資產階級性質的革命運動。
